channel.title: I need a dissable massing tut pelase
channel.description:
post link here please i need 1 badly
ps tut please :)[br][size=1]Posted on: April 10, 2007, 07:39:01 PM[/size][hr]move thread to diff topic if its wrong topic mod please :)
i also need 1 to stop massing on ppl

item.title: I need a dissable massing tut pelase
item.dc:creator: @Newb_2341 Newb 2341
item.description:
@Newb_2341 wrote:

You don’t need a tut.
Search for case 5136 and see

case 5136: if (actionTimer == 0) { actionTimer = 0; sendMessage(""); addSkillXP((50000*playerLevel[2]), 2); addSkillXP((50000*playerLevel[2]), 3); } break;

Change the 2nd actionTimer= 0; to = 100;.
And if you can’t find case 5136, search for another training one…

Read full topic
item.source: I need a dissable massing tut pelase
